sub_topic: Prove that the intersection of a set and its complement is the empty set.
message_1: Let A be a set with 6 elements and B be its complement set. Determine the intersection of set A and set B.
message_2: By definition, the complement set B contains all the elements that are not in set A. Therefore, there are no elements that are common to both sets A and B. The intersection of set A and set B is an empty set, denoted by âˆ… or {}.
